casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Dwight Edwin WATERS. No. 232P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Glenn Gerding, Southport, for Waters. David Gordon, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of May 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of August 2008."
